content:
I don't have access to current events or news updates. however, i can tell you that virtual events and shows have become popular during the pandemic, and many are planned for the future. 

for instance, some music festivals have gone virtual, with performances streamed online. virtual performances by popular artists like billie eilish have also been planned.

additionally, some tv shows have announced that they will continue producing episodes virtually in the future, even after the pandemic ends, as it offers them increased flexibility and may reduce costs.

on the other hand, some events, like the olympics and other major sporting events, have been postponed to a later date, while others have been canceled altogether.

as the pandemic continues, it's likely that more virtual events and shows will be planned to ensure that audiences are still able to enjoy their favorite content while following covid-19 safety protocols.
